Package org.cesecore.certificates.crl

Class CrlStoreSessionBean

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cesecore.certificates.crl.CrlStoreSessionBean
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CrlStoreSession, CrlStoreSessionLocal, CrlStoreSessionRemote
    public class CrlStoreSessionBean
extends Object
implements CrlStoreSessionLocal, CrlStoreSessionRemote
    The name is kept for historic reasons. This Session Bean is used for creating and retrieving CRLs and information about CRLs. CRLs are signed using SignSessionBean.
    Version:
    $Id: CrlStoreSessionBean.java 25498 2017-03-15 17:01:37Z jeklund $

    • Method Detail

      • storeCRL

        public void storeCRL​(AuthenticationToken admin,
                     byte[] incrl,
                     String cafp,
                     int number,
                     String issuerDN,
                     Date thisUpdate,
                     Date nextUpdate,
                     int deltaCRLIndicator)
              throws CrlStoreException,
                     AuthorizationDeniedException
        Description copied from interface: CrlStoreSession
        Stores a CRL
        Specified by:
        storeCRL in interface CrlStoreSession
        Parameters:
        admin - Administrator performing the operation
        incrl - The DER coded CRL to be stored.
        cafp - Fingerprint (hex) of the CAs certificate.
        number - CRL number.
        issuerDN - the issuer of the CRL
        thisUpdate - when this CRL was created
        nextUpdate - when this CRL expires
        deltaCRLIndicator - -1 for a normal CRL and 1 for a deltaCRL
        Throws:
        CrlStoreException - (rollback) if an error occured storing the CRL
        AuthorizationDeniedException - (rollback) if admin was not authorized to store CRL

      • getLastCRL

        public byte[] getLastCRL​(String issuerdn,
                         boolean deltaCRL)
        Description copied from interface: CrlStoreSession
        Retrieves the latest CRL issued by this CA.
        Specified by:
        getLastCRL in interface CrlStoreSession
        Parameters:
        issuerdn - the CRL issuers DN (CAs subject DN)
        deltaCRL - true to get the latest deltaCRL, false to get the latest complete CRL
        Returns:
        byte[] with DER encoded X509CRL or null of no CRLs have been issued.

      • getCRL

        public byte[] getCRL​(String issuerdn,
                     int crlNumber)
        Description copied from interface: CrlStoreSession
        Retrieves a specific CRL issued by this CA.
        Specified by:
        getCRL in interface CrlStoreSession
        Parameters:
        issuerdn - the CRL issuers DN (CAs subject DN)
        crlNumber - a crlNumber of a complete, or delta, CRL
        Returns:
        byte[] with DER encoded X509CRL or null of no CRLs have been issued.

      • getLastCRLInfo

        public CRLInfo getLastCRLInfo​(String issuerdn,
                              boolean deltaCRL)
        Description copied from interface: CrlStoreSession
        Retrieves the information about the latest CRL issued by this CA. Retrieves less information than getLastCRL, i.e. not the actual CRL data.
        Specified by:
        getLastCRLInfo in interface CrlStoreSession
        Parameters:
        issuerdn - the CRL issuers DN (CAs subject DN)
        deltaCRL - true to get the latest deltaCRL, false to get the latest complete CRL
        Returns:
        CRLInfo of last CRL by CA or null if no CRL exists.

      • getCRLInfo

        public CRLInfo getCRLInfo​(String fingerprint)
        Description copied from interface: CrlStoreSession
        Retrieves the information about the specified CRL. Retrieves less information than getLastCRL, i.e. not the actual CRL data.
        Specified by:
        getCRLInfo in interface CrlStoreSession
        Parameters:
        fingerprint - fingerprint of the CRL
        Returns:
        CRLInfo of CRL or null if no CRL exists.

      • getLastCRLNumber

        public int getLastCRLNumber​(String issuerdn,
                            boolean deltaCRL)
        Description copied from interface: CrlStoreSession
        Retrieves the highest CRLNumber issued by the CA.
        Specified by:
        getLastCRLNumber in interface CrlStoreSession
        Parameters:
        issuerdn - the subjectDN of a CA certificate
        deltaCRL - true to get the latest deltaCRL, false to get the latest complete CRL
        Returns:
        the highest CRL number of CRLs issued by issuerdn, or 0 if no CRLs were issued.
